children.summary: Manual note-taking and searching for key points in audio/video content is time-consuming and inefficient.

children.topic: Solution: A Power Media Processing Tool
children.summary: A tool that can transcribe, analyze, and provide interactive features for easier content consumption.
High-accuracy transcription of audio/video files with background noise and multiple accents.
Detects emotions in speech, useful for analyzing customer calls, debates, or interviews.
Searchable key words, clickable timestamps, and AI-generated summaries for easy navigation.
Using XDS, TypeScript, Express, PostgreSQL, GIFF Mac, and Wave software JS for a seamless user experience.
XDS and TypeScript for a smooth user interface.
Express for handling requests, PostgreSQL for storing bookmarks and timestamps, GIFF Mac for video processing.
Anyone dealing with audio/video content, including corporations, students, legal teams, and content creators.
Extracting key decisions from long meetings, analyzing customer interactions for better service.
Students using it as a study aid, legal teams generating automatic transcripts, content creators repurposing best moments.
A tool that can transform the process of consuming audio/video content, making it more accessible, interactive, and intelligent.
